title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: Comprehensive Report on Military Actions and Locations”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanon: terror infrastructures, a military post, a launching site, and a military building were attacked.

A short while ago, combat aircraft attacked targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanon, in the open field Marwahin, terror infrastructures and a launching site of the organization were attacked.

In addition, the IDF attacked a military post, a military building, and another terrorist infrastructure that served the terror organization in the village areas of Ramiya, Yaroun, and Shihin in southern Lebanon. Also, earlier today (Sunday), gunfire was directed at a suspicious detection in the area of the village Khila.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3uta7FW
